plants.name: Spider Plant-Reverse
plants.description: Also known as Spider Ivy or the Airplane Plant but is botanically named Chlorophytum comosum.

plants.name: Pilea Peperomioides-Chinese Money
plants.description: A popular houseplant due to its unique round leaves and its reputation for bringing good fortune and prosperity.

plants.name: Parlor Palm
plants.description: A species of small palm tree native to the rainforests in Southern Mexico and Guatemala.

plants.name: Bird's Nest Nidus Fern
plants.description: Native to tropical regions such as southeast Asia, Australia, east Africa and Hawaii to name a few, Birdâ€™s Nest Ferns (Asplenium Nidus) are typically found in palm trees.

plants.name: Palm Ponytail
plants.description: Beaucarnea recurvata, the elephant's foot or ponytail palm, is a species of plant in the family Asparagaceae. The species was native to numerous states of eastern Mexico but is now confined to the state of Veracruz.
